text: The Animikie Group of sediments were deposited between 2.5 and 1.8 billion years ago, within the Animikie Basin. This group of formations are divided into the Gunflint Range, the Mesabi and Vermilion ranges, and the Cuyuna Range. Category:Geology Category:Mountain ranges of the United States Category:Mountains of the United States Category:Mountains of Canada
title: Animikie Group
